mobs.LongDesc: A male stonedowner is standing here smiling.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Obviously someones husband, and obviously well fed, this man stands about
6'0" and weighs over 200 lbs, and it looks to be all muscle.  He smiles and
nod at you as he notices your gaze.

mobs.LongDesc: A female stonedowner is sitting nearby.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Smiling to herself, a female stonedowner is sitting here, glancing at the
men and children from time to time.  There is a serene inner beauty seen in
her eyes.  She is truly happy with her life.

mobs.LongDesc: A stonedown child is here, playing.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This child is beauty incarnate in a youngster.  Full of life and energy,
they run from place to place, seeming to ignore fatigue.

mobs.LongDesc: Trell, the stonedown's Gravelingas, is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Trell, the stonedown's Gravelingas is standing here.  He is a very muscular
man, and his hands are worn and calloused, but his eyes are kind.  He looks
like a typical gentle father type, and he smiles at you as you enter.

mobs.LongDesc: Atiaran Trell-Mate is standing here, cooking for her family.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Atiarian Trell-Mate is both wife to the Stonedowns Gravelingas, but mother
to Lena as well.  She is embroiled in cooking dinner for her family and does
not see you come in, but you feel if she did, you would be welcomed.

mobs.ShortDesc: Lena, daugher of Atiaran and Trell
mobs.LongDesc: Lena, daughter of Atiaran and Trell is sitting here smiling.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This young lady is absolutely lovely!  She is, without a doubt, the most
beautiful woman in the entire stonedown.  As you look at her, you can see
the resemblence to both Trell and Atiaran, and she smiles and stands to
greet you as you enter.

mobs.LongDesc: Triock, betrothed to Lena, is here glowering at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Triock, son of Thuler is standing here, glowering.  He is engaged to Lena,
daughter of Trell and Atiaran, and is very possessive of her (as well as a bit
over protective).  He is very strong, as all stonedown men are, and looks
easily angered.

mobs.LongDesc: An apprentice gravelingas is standing here, ready to assist.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This young man is an apprentice gravelingas, working with Trell, the master
gravelingas for the stonedown.  He is very strong and appears rather
intelligent as well.  He looks eager to learn.

mobs.LongDesc: A male revelwood villager is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man who stands before you looks strong and agile.  He looks at you with
slight suspicion, but offers you a tentative smile regardless.

mobs.LongDesc: A female Revelwood villager is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This woman is lithe and spritely, lean and agile looking.  She looks at
you with a penitrating gaze that makes you feel naked and unsettled.  You
look away, but not before you notice her slight smile.

mobs.LongDesc: A revelwood child is here, looking at you with big eyes.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This child looks at you with undisguised awe.  You are obviously one of few
strangers this child has ever seen, and they are rooted to spot where they
stand, staring at you.  It's almost humorous, in an odd way.

mobs.LongDesc: The Staff-Elder of the Lillianrill is here, instructing.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Staff-Elder of the Lillianrill looks you over with calm, wise eyes.  He
seems to take your image as a serious consideration on whether you are friend
or foe, and you're not quite sure if he's made up his mind...

mobs.LongDesc: A Hirebrand stands here, ready to assist the Staff-Elder.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
These young men are here to learn at the hands of the Staff-Elder.  They
both look young and inquisitive, and barely spare you a glance, so enrapt are
they with the Staff-Elders teachings.

mobs.LongDesc: A vicious Kresh wolf is crouched here, growling at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Snarling at you, this Kresh wolf is a dirty yellow color, and looks like it
hasn't eaten in quite a while.  Whether it's just hunger or some kind of
real intelligence you see in it's eyes doesn't matter as it lunges at you,
jaws wide!

mobs.LongDesc: A giant stands here, smiling at you merrily.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Standing over 10 feet, this giant regards you with eyes filled with delight
and a smile on his face.  "Hello my friend! Be welcome in the Land" he says,
motioning for you to join him.

mobs.LongDesc: A bloodguard of the Haruchai stands here, his watchful eyes seeing all.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A Bloodguard of the Haruchai studies you through watchful eyes that never
sleep.  Because of an ancient vow, they have sworn their lives to the
protection of the Lords and the Land.

mobs.LongDesc: The bloodguard Bannor, of the Haruchai, stands here, tensed and ready.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Bannor, of the Bloodguard, stands here, his passionless eyes gazing about
at everything.  His was the duty to guard the Ul-Lord Thomas Covenant, White
Gold wielder and Ringthane, and he looks able to do that and more.

mobs.LongDesc: Warmark Quaan is here, pondering strategies against the Despiser.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This grizzled old war veteran still stands strong and tall, and his eyes
look to have seen the evils of war, but recognized it's neccessity, and
he appears reconciled to fight.  The thought flashes across your mind that
you might not want to anger him.

mobs.LongDesc: Hiltmark Amorine is standing here, glaring like a drill seargent.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Stern and hard, this woman stands before you, a solid rock of discipline.
As you gaze at here, the only word that crosses your mind is 'battleaxe',
such is the authority that seems to eminate from her.

mobs.LongDesc: Lord Hyrim is standing here, eyes dancing merrily.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man looks to be one who enjoys fine dining.  In fact, he almost looks
like a man who enjoys ANY dining at all.  He is what you would call a robust
man, and his eyes dance merrily as he regards you, smiling.

mobs.LongDesc: Lord Shetra is here, looking grim and proper.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Lord Shetra is standing nearby, surveying the room with a cool, even eye.
She appears stern and ready to disapprove, and her eyes never leave you for
a second.  She makes you feel like you're back in the third grade again...

mobs.LongDesc: Lord Mhoram is here, regarding you with a quiet wisdom.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Lord Mhoram is a man of moderate build, but sharp features and penitrating
eyes.  He regards you with a quiet dignity and nods solemnly to you as he
returns your gaze sincerely.

mobs.LongDesc: High Lord Elena is here, preparing for a Council meeting.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
As you gaze at High Lord Elena, you wonder how someone so young could have
risen to be the head of the Council of Lords.  Elena seems almost naive, until
you look into her eyes, and see the wisdom of the ages there.  It is obvious
this young woman has seen and experienced much in her life thus far.

mobs.LongDesc: A soldier of revelstone is standing at attention here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This young man who stands at attention, steadfastly ignoring your gaze, is
a soldier in the army housed at Revelstone.  It is his job to safeguard and
protect the Keep and the inhabitants of the land from any physical threat.

mobs.LongDesc: A male woodhelven villager is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Taught with tradition and fear, this villager stands ready to defend his
village from any threat, be it from Lord Foul the Despiser and his minions,
or from a stranger like you.  He appears able to deal with just about
anything.

mobs.LongDesc: A female woodhelven villager is sitting here, nervously.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This woman sitting here looks like she has had a rough life.  The war with
the Despiser has pulled almost all the joy out of life, and replaced it
with fear and anxiety.  But, just as you think thats all there is, you notice
a faint glimmer in her eyes. Hope? Perhaps, but something nonetheless.

mobs.LongDesc: A small woodhelven child here, trying to play.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This child looks like he knows that something is wrong, but doesn't quite
understand what it is, or how serious it is, so he's trying to enjoy himself
and play like usual, but is being hindered by the fear and worry that is
eminating from his elders here.  He looks at you with a strange, almost
hopeful expression, as if maybe you can help somehow.

mobs.LongDesc: Llaura, Heer of Soaring Woodhelven is standing here thinking.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Llaura is a beautiful young woman, and the Heer (town leader) of Soaring
Woodhelven.  She looks battle-worn and fearful, and you can see the edge
of tears in her eyes, but behind those almost-tears lies a fierce sense of
determination to protect her people, and the child Pietten, who she has
chosen to be ward of, after his parents were killed by Urviles.

mobs.LongDesc: Pietten, Llaura's adopted child, stands here looking haunted.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Pietten, the child adopted by Llaura after his parents were killed by
Urviles, looks up as you enter.  You are greeted by such a frank, almost
murderous look that you pull up short of approaching him.  His eyes look
haunted and evil.  He smiles at you suddenly, almost like an attack, and
you can see the blood in his teeth.  You do not think it is his either.

mobs.LongDesc: An urvile is here, growling and snarling softly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This creature is black, from top of misshapen head, through flat, pupil-less
eyes and long, cruelly clawed hands, a distorted yet muscular torso, long
obscenely thin legs, to his clawed, calloused feet.  As you gaze in utter
revulsion at this monstrosity, it looks up at you and grins an evil, feral
grin, revealing two rows of uneven, razor-sharp teeth.  As you stare into
that mouth, you cannot help but shudder.

mobs.LongDesc: A demonic cavewight is coiled here, ready to attack.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
With long scrawny limbs, hands as huge as shovels, a thin, hunched torso
and a head like a battering ram, these creature almost looks comical.  As it
crouches, it's knees come up to the level of it's ears.  But as it senses
you, it unfolds itself, like a spider awakening from a long sleep, and what
you once thought comical now looks completely different, in fact... Deadly!

mobs.LongDesc: Drool Rockworm is here, raving wildly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
More decrepit looking than a normal cavewight, Drool appears to be some sort
of elder in the cavewight community.  His head is mottled and wrinkled, and
he walks with a pronounced limp, almost like a spider missing legs.  You
notice that he drips a disgusting liquid from his lips whenever he speaks,
and the fact that he doesn't seem to notice leads you to begin to wonder if
he has gone completely and utterly mad...

mobs.LongDesc: A plainsman of the Ramen is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Browned by the suns rays and the plains winds, this man of the plains, a
member of the tribe of Ramen who tend the Ranyhyn, looks at you steadily.

mobs.LongDesc: A plainswoman is here, her hair blowing in the warm winds.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Head thrown back proudly, hair streaming in the wind, this woman looks at
you with an arrogance that gives you pause.  This is obviously a woman
that is quite capable of standing her own in any situation.

mobs.LongDesc: A plainschild is here, running like the wind.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This child looks like he is always running!  He is the very essence of
free and unbridled energy as he sprints around, grinning wolfishly at you.

mobs.LongDesc: A mane is here, tending to the needs of the Ranyhyn.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Before you stands a Mane of the Ranyhyn.  These chosen of the plains
people have dedicated their lives to the needs of the Ranyhyn.  It is to
them that falls the lore of healing for the breed of Noble horses that
reside in these grassy plains, and they do their duties well.

mobs.LongDesc: Manethrall Lithe is standing here, scrutinizing everything.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Although slight of build and size, Manethrall Lithe almost reeks of quiet,
calm authority.  She takes in all she surveys with an assessing gaze, and as
her gaze passes over you, you feel she can see your very soul.

mobs.LongDesc: A Ranyhyn is here, tossing his mane proudly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
As you first view this creature, this horse called a Ranyhyn, you can't
see what seperates this creature from an extraordinarily well bred hourse.
But on further inspection, you can see the grace, the beauty, the
incredible fluidity with which these creatures move.  That, couples with
the uncomfortably intelligent gaze in their eyes, convinces you that these
Ranyhyn are truly a noble species, and one worth respecting.

mobs.LongDesc: A fire lion prowls the slopes here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
At first this creature appears little more than a ball of fire, but as
you get closer, and as you begin to feel it's heat, you can see it is of
feline shape, and it's sharp fire teeth look dangerous and sharp.

mobs.LongDesc: Lord Foul the Despiser is here, desecrating the land.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Lord Foul, the Despiser, the embodiment of corruption in the Land, stands
here laughing at you.  He is a large man, with a neatly trimmed goatee and
eyes with no irises.  His eyes are pure blackness, as black as his heart.

mobs.LongDesc: Saltheart Foamfollower, the last of the Seareach giants is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Bruised and scorched, Saltheart Foamfollower, the last of the Giants of
Seareach stands here. He looks like he has been through hell, but he has
come here, to assist his friend Thomas Covenant in his fight to save the
land. He appears grim of visage, but his eyes laugh with an inner joy.

mobs.LongDesc: Thomas Covenant the Unbeliever is here, fighting to save the land.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Thomas Covenant, the self-named 'Unbeliever', stands here within this huge
cavern, looking small and powerless.  He is wearing clothing that speaks of
his origin from another world, and his visage is that of a man haunted by
memories of that world.  The two outmost fingers of his left hand are
missing, and upon one of the remaining fingers, he wears a white gold
wedding ring.  That ring seems to be glowing with a power that throws off
the evilness of this place.  He looks resolute and steadfast, and prepared
to die to defend this land and its people, if necessary.

mobs.LongDesc: A wraith of Andelain flits through the air here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The figure of a humanoid shape is barely visable within the circle of light
that hovers around this creature.  The wraith of Andelain zips merrily about
your head as you attempt to study it, the flits back off to rejoin the dance.

mobs.LongDesc: A ferocious griffin is here, poised to attack.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This creature has the head and wings of a hawk or falcon, and the body
and tenacity of a Lion.  It looks vicious and dangerous and ready to attack.

mobs.LongDesc: A giant possessed by the might of the illearth stone commands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Although your experience with the giants of this land are limited, it is
clear that something is wrong with this giant.  There is no joy or laughter
in his eyes at all, only death and carnage.  And in the center of the giants
forehead, a small, glowing green hole can be seen, smoking slightly.

mobs.LongDesc: The Stonedown baker is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is the Stonedown's baker.  He is the primary source of food for the
entire village, and by the looks of him, he loves his work!

mobs.LongDesc: An urvile is here, growling and snarling softly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This creature is black, from top of misshapen head, through flat, pupil-less
eyes and long, cruelly clawed hands, a distorted yet muscular torso, long
obscenely thin legs, to his clawed, calloused feet.  As you gaze in utter
revulsion at this monstrosity, it looks up at you and grins an evil, feral
grin, revealing two rows of uneven, razor-sharp teeth.  As you stare into
that mouth, you cannot help but shudder.

mobs.LongDesc: A strange old man in ochre robes is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man seems, at first glance, to be rather infirm and in need of some
medical attention, good food and lots of rest.  But, almost as you gaze upon
him, he seems to alter in your sight, taking on a robust look so strong, you
would swear him to be the very essence of health.  He smiles gently at you
and whispers "Be true, you shall not fail.  There is still love in the world"

mobs.LongDesc: A bloodguard of the Haruchai stands here, his watchful eyes seeing all.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A Bloodguard of the Haruchai studies you through watchful eyes that never
sleep.  Because of an ancient vow, they have sworn their lives to the
protection of the Lords and the Land.

mobs.LongDesc: A glowing beastly fido is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Larger, and more deadly looking than it's pre-war counterparts, this fido
looks at you with intimidatingly intelligent eyes.  It's fur is thick and
bristly, and it's eyes glow with a luminescent green hue.  As you look at
it, a tongue lolls out of its mouth, revealing dual rows of pointed teeth
the size of carpenter's nails.  This is definitely not a normal dog...

mobs.LongDesc: The blob is here, stomping around.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Fat? FAT? I'll show you fat, ya skinny little punk!  I'm the BLOB!  I'm the
heaviest thing around, and when I decide to stand my ground, NOTHIN' can 
move me.  You're in for a WORLD of hurt, pal.

mobs.LongDesc: Mystique is attempting to hide here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Damn, I thought I'd hidden myself well enough so you couldn't see me. Oh
well, that's alright I suppose.  I'm still more than skilled enough to take
out pathetic little people like you.  I'm Mystique.  Used to be the head
of this group, until Magneto took that spot away from me.  He better watch
his ass, or I'll spit him on it, just to spite him.

mobs.LongDesc: Pyro is here, flames leaking from his hands...
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Whatcha lookin' at, mate?  Yeah, my name is Pyro, and fire's what I make.
I'm whatcha call a real 'hot' number. <Pyro laughs>  Listen, mate, tell ya
what:  I'll let ya get a 1 second head start before I star burnin' your
bum with my little pets.  Deal?

mobs.LongDesc: Avalanche is here, rumbling.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Whatchs starin' at, ya worm!  I'm Avalanche, and I make things... rumble.
I been hooked up with Pyro for years, but I'm thinkin' of goin' it on my
own.  He's too much of a hothead fer me... Hahahahaha.... Hey! You don't like
my jokes?  Well, then, let's see how ya like a pratfall...

mobs.LongDesc: Sabretooth is crouched here, ready to attack.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Grrrrrrrrrrr..... I don't wanna talk to you.  I just wanna kill ya.  You
look like one of them bleedin' heart types, wantin' ta save the animals and
all that.  You got 2 seconds to get out before I gut ya.  Hah!  I lied!

mobs.LongDesc: Magneto is here, planning his next attack.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Ah, I see you have actually survived to greet me.  Well, know that you have
come to the end of your journey, for I am Magneto, Master of Magnetism!  You
will surely die if you do not leave immediately.  I am far to busy to waste
time and energy destroying you, but interfere with my plans and rest assured
I shall, and you will perish in pain.  Your choice, but I grow impatient...
